name: Phantomas Saga: Infinity
overview: As Phantomas, you have to destroy the Thief Androids Factory activating the ten auto-destruction devices the building has, the BOLTs: Binaural Onslaught Light Transmitters, located in highly restricted areas. Each BOLT needs a key to be activated. Your job is to find 10 keys to use them in the 10 BOLTs. Once the 10 devices are activated, you'll have 30 seconds to run outside the factory, because after that time has passed the factory will explode in a million of fragments.
